app.name: InnerFriend
app.description: A privaxy-first tool for maintaining meaningful friendships based on Dunbar's number research

landing.heroDescription: Based on Dunbar's research, we kan only truly maintain about 5 intimate friendships, 15 klose friends, and 150 meaningful konnektions. Inner Friend helps you intentionally nurture the relationships that matter most.

intentionalLimits.title: Intentional Limits
intentionalLimits.description: Sience shows we have natural limits to meaningful relationships. Embrase them to fokus on who truly matters.

privateByDefault.title: Private by Default
privateByDefault.description: Your lists stay on your devise. Kreate an akount only if you want persistense and optional mutual matching.

mutualDiscovery.title: Mutual Diskovery‚Åµ
mutualDiscovery.description: Optionally learn when someone you've listed as klose has also listed you ‚Äî a gentle selebration of resiprosity.

mission.title: Fase Time, Not Ad Time
mission.description: We win when you leave our site ‚Äî to share real moments with the people who matter most. When distanse separates you, we'll help you spark vid√©o kalls. But nothing beats being there.
mission.inspiration: Our inspiration: Dentyne Ice "Make Fase Time"

landing.quote: "Not all relationships are symmetrikal ‚Äî and that's perfektly natural. The goal isn't perfekt balanse, but intentional presense."

contactImport.title: Import Kontakts
contactImport.description: Import kontakts from your phone, vKard file, or CSV/KSV spreadsheet. All kontakts will be added as Akquainted Kuzins.
contactImport.capacityFull: Your Akquainted tier is full. Promote some kontakts to make room.
contactImport.importingDescription: Adding kontakts to your Akquainted Kuzins...
contactImport.privacyNote: Your kontakt data stays on your device. We never upload or store it.
contactImport.defaultCountryHint: Phone numbers without a kountry‚Åµ kode will use this kountry‚Åµ. Most kontakts are stored without kountry‚Åµ kodes.

reserved.deleteConfirmDescription: This will remove {{count}} reserved spot{{note}} from your {{tier}} tier.

reserved.notePlaceholder: Only you can see this. E.g., 'People from the hiking group'
reserved.notePlaceholderLong: Only you can see this. E.g., 'People from the hiking group' or 'Family members who prefer privacy'
reserved.addDescription: Reserve spots for people you don't want to explicitly list. Each group counts toward your {{tier}} limit but stays private.

addFriend.circleFullHint: To add someone here, you'll need to move a current {{tier}} friend to another tier first.

dashboard.dunbarDisclaimer: Note: These Dunbar-inspired tier limits are subject to change as community conscience science evolves. Future modifications may include rules where certain tier counts affect others ‚Äî for example, parasocial connections might reduce your allowable outer friend capacity.

mission.title: Face Time, Not Ad Time
mission.description: We win when you leave our site ‚Äî to share real moments with the people who matter most.
mission.inspiration: Our inspiration? This classic Dentyne Ice commercial ‚Äî the perfect reminder that the best moments happen when you put down the phone and show up:
mission.quote: "Make Face Time" ‚Äî that's the ideal. When distance separates you, we'll help you bridge it with video kalls. But always remember: nothing beats being there.
